description:
Aspose.BarCode for .NET is a robust and reliable barcode generation and recognition component, written in managed C#, it allows developers to quickly and easily add barcode generation and recognition functionality to their Microsoft .NET applications (WinForms, ASP.NET and .NET Compact Framework). 

Aspose.BarCode for .NET supports most established barcode standards and barcode specifications. It has the ability to export to multiple image formats including: BMP, EMF, GIF, JPEG, PNG, TIFF and WMF.
releaseNotes:
New Features
BARCODENET-21987	Supported Code39Standard generation for Silverlight	 
BARCODENET-22586	Supported Code11 generation for silverlight
BARCODENET-22589	Supported Standard2of5 generation for silverlight 
BARCODENET-22590	Supported Matrix2of5 generation for silverlight 
BARCODENET-22594	Supported ItalianPost25 generation for silverlight 
BARCODENET-22595	Supported PZN generation for silverlight 
BARCODENET-22737	Supported VIN barcode generation for silverlight	 
BARCODENET-26467	Supported Code128 recognition windows phone 7 

Enhancements
BARCODENET-27727	Enhance the Recognition toolkit for .NET
BARCODENET-33211	Provided enhanced Margins setter to set all at once 
BARCODENET-33123	Enhanced the generation module to throw an exception when data limit exceeds
BARCODENET-33227	Updated EULA to 5th April 2012

Bugs Fixed
BARCODENET-4466		Empty Code128 recognized 
BARCODENET-13958	Aztec barcode generation with special character in codetext
BARCODENET-14753	Aztec barcode data decode algorithm
BARCODENET-17596	Only top barcode is recognized from an image that has 2 barcodes
BARCODENET-17611	False positive recognition for Patchcode 
BARCODENET-18400	Aztec recognition problem 
BARCODENET-33236	Aspose.Barcode.dll is not present is 4.0_ClientProfile folder
BARCODENET-29999	Toolkit does not read Onecode barcodes
BARCODENET-33209	Cannot recognize Code128 from PNG
BARCODENET-33203	Incorrect results when scanned Code39Standard
BARCODENET-33197	PDF417 recognition failed	 
BARCODENET-30568	Aztec barcode could not be recognized in .NET
BARCODENET-33195	Error in rotation algorithm for 24BPP encoding
BARCODENET-31903	EMF file has extra space in the image
BARCODENET-33165	Cannot recognize rotated Code39Standard from Tiff
BARCODENET-33188	When ImageQuality is set to AntiAlias, a faded line appears below the CodeText
BARCODENET-24128	InvalidCodeException not thrown when codetext format is invalid for EAN13 type

Exceptions
BARCODENET-33226	IndexOutOfRangeException: Index was outside the bounds of the array
BARCODENET-33172	ArgumentException: Destination array was not long enough.. at BarCodeReader.Read()
BARCODENET-33192	InvalidCastException:"Specified cast is not valid" at BarCodeBuilder.Save
summary: Aspose.BarCode for .NET is a robust and reliable barcode generation and recognition component
title: Aspose.BarCode for .NET
